question: Which country celebrates "Blacks and Whites Carnival"?
explanation: Blacks and Whites Carnival or Carnaval de Negros Y Blancos! is the largest carnival celebration in Colombia. It is celebrated annually from January 2nd to 7th every year. On 2009, UNESCO declared the Blacks and Whites Carnival as one of the Masterpieces of the Oral and Intangible Heritage of Humanity.
